t.t-value: (submenu.is_mega_menu and submenu.is_visible) or submenu.child_id.filtered(lambda menu: menu.is_visible)

a.t-attf-class: #{link_class or ''} #{'active' if submenu.clean_url() and unslug_url(request.httprequest.path) == unslug_url(submenu.clean_url()) else ''}

li.t-attf-class: #{item_class or ''} dropdown #{ (submenu.clean_url() and submenu.clean_url() != '/' and any(request.httprequest.path == child.url for child in submenu.child_id if child.url) or (submenu.clean_url() and request.httprequest.path == submenu.clean_url())) and 'active' } #{submenu.is_mega_menu and 'position-static'}
